text: The 1926–27 international cricket season was from September 1926 to April 1927. There were no any Test cricket held during this period. ==Season overview== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="7" |International tours |- ! rowspan="2" |Start date ! rowspan="2" |Home team ! rowspan="2" |Away team ! colspan="4" |Results [Matches] |- !Test !ODI !FC !LA |- | | |Marylebone |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |0–1 [2] |; style="text-align:center"| — |- | | |Marylebone |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |0–1 [4] |; style="text-align:center"| — |- | | | |; style="text-align:center"| — |; style="text-align:center"| — |0–0 [3] |; style="text-align:center"| — |} ==December== === MCC in India === {| class="wikitable" |- ! colspan="9"|Unofficial Test series |- !
